metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36054 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
XMP Toolkit SDK version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a buffer overflow vulnerability potentially resulting in local application denial of service in the context of the current user. Exploitation requires user interaction in that a victim must open a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-36054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1
libexempi8 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed in adobe's 2021.07 code drop

criterions.comment: exempi package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1').
